meanings.definition: A person who takes photographs using a microscope.
meanings.sent1: The talented microphotographers captured tiny details unseen by the naked eye.
meanings.sent2: Microphotographers use specialized equipment to capture images at a microscopic level.
meanings.sent3: The microphotographers found a whole new world in a drop of water.
meanings.sent4: The microphotographers' work revealed hidden beauty in the smallest of subjects.
meanings.sent5: The microphotographers' skill in capturing minuscule details was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: The act of taking photographs using a microscope.
meanings.sent1: Careful microphotographers must adjust focus to capture clear images.
meanings.sent2: The process of microphotographers involves precise adjustments to capture tiny subjects.
meanings.sent3: The microphotographers' task seemed like a game of finding hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: In the world of photography, microphotographers are like explorers of the unseen.
meanings.sent5: The art of microphotographers brings the microscopic world into view.
